alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 8:30AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Wintry Precipitation Moving Out... .As wintry precipitation has started to clear across some portions of the area, reports of 8 to 12 inches of snow and a 1/4 inch of ice have been received. This wintry mix of snow and freezing drizzle will continue to move northeast out of the local area late this morning. Winds will continue to drift snow, especially on ridge tops, higher terrain and open areas. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations under an inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Iowa, Fayette and Clayton Counties. In Wisconsin, Grant County. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
